_header: Alas to whom shall I complain
_description: A lover’s complaint — two stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCCVI182.First Lines:
Alass to chom schall I complaneof this grett payn þat I In
                    dureffor dred of danger and dyssdan…
CamTCCVI182.Last Lines:
…be schesch yov to gav me In RememeraunsAnd I schall pray to
                    þe hevyn kyng to hav yov in his governauns
